content: this cat ear cup cozy is a cute item to sell at a craft show or to gift it works up quickly **yarn ** 30 yards of #4 worsted weight yarn wecrochet mighty stitch or lion brand wool ease or suitable substitutes **skills & techniques used ** you will need to know how to work in turned rounds know stitches such as chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet and treble_crochet **hook size ** us size 7 4 5mm crochet hook **other ** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer 1 https //www simplyhookedbyjanet com/cat-ear-cup-cozy-free-crochet-pattern/
